language.description: Bot for importing Vertical Search feeds into posts.

specs.title: VS feed URL
specs.description: Specify the URL of the Vertical Search feed to pull articles from.

specs.title: VS single item URL prefix
specs.description: Specify the single item URL prefix to pull a single article contents.

specs.title: User Agents for the file fetchers
specs.description: If you want to use different user agent strings for the file fetchers, specify one per line here.

specs.title: User level for source accounts
specs.description:
Specify the level to set to user accounts created for article sources.
Default: 100 (Author)

specs.title: Account id fallback
specs.description:
When a source account cannot be created, the article will be set to the specified user id.
Default: 100000000000000 (Default Admin account)

specs.title: Category id fallback
specs.description:
When an article can't be set to any category, set the one provided here.
Default: 0000000000000 (Default category id)

specs.title: Categories and keywords
specs.description:
Specify the categories and the keywords to match against in contents for automatic assignment using the next syntax:
Category name: keyword, keyword, keyword...

Other category name: keyword, keyword, keyword, keyword,
keyword, keyword, keyword...

# This is a comment!

Yet another category name: keyword, keyword, keyword...
Note: you can use multiple lines as needed, but use an empty blank line to separate one category from the next.

Important: if you rename a category listed here, make sure you also rename it in the categories editor or the category will be created and only new articles will be set to it.

specs.title: Featured article keywords
specs.description:
Specify a comma-separated list of the keywords an article should have to stick it a "featured" tag (as defined in the Posts reading/writing options).
When at least 3 of the keywords match, the tag will be set.
